description:
在这一场六级口语考试的个人陈述（Individual presentation）环节中，题目给出的是一张图片，图片上所画的内容是：一个老人摔倒，有一个女士路过走开，有两个男士则要求签写证明之后再扶起老人。该环节要求考生描述图片中的内容，然后给出自己的做法。考生有一分钟的准备时间，之后用1.5分钟的时间来作答。由于准备时间有限，因此考生要尽量把图画内容表达清楚，然后简明扼要地发表自己的看法。
下面，以下示例供大家参考：
As is clearly shown in the picture, an old man is lying on the ground. A lady who passes by just walks away without hesitation, while two young men decide that identification must be signed before they help the old man up. It reflects a lack of trust between people. Nowadays, many people are not willing to help an old man up in the street because they fear that the old man could be a tricker, who may wangle money from them. If it’s me, I will undoubtedly help the old man up. I think if we trust each other and feel happy to render help to each other, then the world will become a better place.
